title: Gladiator Jarvan Skin Idea
body: Me and my friend were talking about Jarvan's skins and how Warring Kingdoms is the only decent one, and came up with the idea of "Gladiator Jarvan". His ultimate, instead of making a circle of rock, would make a Colosseum and cheering noises while it is up.. His E, instead of being a flag, would be a head on a pike or something. I hope you like my idea and thanks for reading!

replies.body: Dragonslayer needs a VU it's out of date. So does Dragonslayer Vayne. But I guess her red chroma pack sort of makes her fit in with Dragonslayer Panth and Braum.
It's not the only decent one, Victorious Jarvan! Though new skin concept's are always nice.
It is cool, he could all be about showmanship and the spotlight but in a more brutal manner then Draven. He could even have a more twisted version of his own ideals
